testcase.classname: Navigation and verify Size, Width Selection controls
testcase.name: Navigatioin and Verify if size and width selection are displayed
testcase.system-out: Given User has Navigated to Zappos home page................................passed When User selects "Shoes" from Shop Men's...................................passed And Select "Boots" from from Men's Shoes....................................passed Then A new page should appear with title "Boots, Men | Shipped Free at Zappos".passed When User select "Keen Utility" from brand menu.............................passed And Select "Pittsburgh Boot" boots from the list............................passed Then Browser should navigate to Add to cart page............................passed When user select Add to cart without selecting size/width...................passed Then Please select a Size and Please select a width appear..................passed

testcase.classname: Verify "Dont See your Size" link and complete popup Window
testcase.name: Verify "Dont See your Size" link and complete popup Window
testcase.system-out: Given User has Navigated to Zappos home page................................passed When User selects "Shoes" from Shop Men's...................................passed And Select "Boots" from from Men's Shoes....................................passed Then A new page should appear with title "Boots, Men | Shipped Free at Zappos".passed When User select "Keen Utility" from brand menu.............................passed And Select "Pittsburgh Boot" boots from the list............................passed Then Browser should navigate to Add to cart page............................passed When click on Don't see your size Link......................................passed Then Notify me Popup display................................................passed When Fill Notify me with Email "test@gmail.com".............................passed And Color with "Raven/Yellow"...............................................passed And Size with "9"...........................................................passed And Width with "EE - Wide"..................................................passed And Select Notify me........................................................passed Then Acknowledgement page displayed with Thank You..........................passed
